channel.title: Help Me Host on RSWebclients, It Loads the Game for 2 Seconds then Disconnects
channel.description:
Ok, I run my server from computer, I've portforwarded and all. The client fully loads, then asks for user name and password. I put it in, and it loads into the game for 2 seconds then quits? WHY!!????
1. I have port-forwarded the port.
2. I tried it with disabled firewall.
3. Tried it with another totally different 317. (BlankScape) Same Problem
4. My Server Client has the No-Ip and it loads the cache and everything perfectly in RSWebclients, and there seems to be no issue with the server, but the webclient just quits after 2 seconds.
what might be the issue? what might I need to edit?
http://www.rswebclients.com/fly4fantasy
it won't load for you because my server might not be running. It fully loads only when my Server Batch file is initiated.

item.title: Help Me Host on RSWebclients, It Loads the Game for 2 Seconds then Disconnects
item.dc:creator: @Fly4Fantasy Fly4Fantasy
item.description:

Ok, I run my server from computer, I’ve portforwarded and all. The client fully loads, then asks for user name and password. I put it in, and it loads into the game for 2 seconds then quits? WHY???
